title: Meta starts task force in fight against child pornography on Instagram
description: A Stanford University report found large networks of accounts operated by minors advertising self-generated child sexual abuse images.

title: The best air quality index apps to check wildfire smoke near you
description: Low air quality amid wildfires makes it unsafe to go outside in some parts of the Eastern U.S. and Midwest, but weather apps can help you check your risk.

title: Companies want to use AI tracking to make you better at your job
description: AI companies suggest they can help workers boost sales, lower stress and feel more connected. But some workers worry about data collection and privacy.
